Package TADK

Class DeviceConnection

java.lang.Object
TADK.DeviceConnection
public class DeviceConnection
extends java.lang.Object
This is DeviceConnection class to handle TCP Connection for TADk. and open streams for input/output buffers.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    java.lang.String ip
    IP address of TADK.
    boolean isConnected
    TCP Connection Flag(True/False).
    int port
    TCP Port number of TADK.
    int rtAddress
    RT address of TADK if configured as RT, 0 for BC and BM .
    int terminalType
    Terminal Type i.e BC(2)/RT(3)/BM(4).

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    DeviceConnection​(java.lang.String ip, int port, int rtAddress, int terminalType)  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void connect()
    This method will open a socket and connect to TADK through TCP.
    DeviceData readDevice()
    this method is used to read data from TCP and parse the TCP packet.
    void sendDevice​(DeviceData data, int command, int action)
    this method is used to encode the data to the TADK API format, and sends to TADK.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Field Details

    • ip

      public java.lang.String ip
      IP address of TADK.

    • port

      public int port
      TCP Port number of TADK.

    • rtAddress

      public int rtAddress
      RT address of TADK if configured as RT, 0 for BC and BM .

    • terminalType

      public int terminalType
      Terminal Type i.e BC(2)/RT(3)/BM(4).

    • isConnected

      public boolean isConnected
      TCP Connection Flag(True/False).

  • Constructor Details

    • DeviceConnection

      public DeviceConnection​(java.lang.String ip, int port, int rtAddress, int terminalType)
      Parameters:
      ip - IP address of TADK
      port - TCP port of TADk
      rtAddress - (1-30)RT address to be configured,0-BC,0-BM
      terminalType - Type of terminal i.e BC-2,RT-3,BM-4, as defined in Device Constants class

  • Method Details

    • connect

      public void connect() throws java.net.UnknownHostException, java.io.IOException
      This method will open a socket and connect to TADK through TCP.
      Throws:
      java.net.UnknownHostException
      java.io.IOException

    • readDevice

      public DeviceData readDevice()
      this method is used to read data from TCP and parse the TCP packet.
      Returns:
      DeviceData the data read from TADK is returned

    • sendDevice

      public void sendDevice​(DeviceData data, int command, int action) throws java.io.IOException
      this method is used to encode the data to the TADK API format, and sends to TADK.
      Parameters:
      data - A data object of type DeviceData
      command - (0-3)Command Type i.e Get-0/Set-1/Config-2/RT->RT-3
      action - (0-19) as defined in DeviceConstants
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException
